import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button, FloatingLabel } from 'react-bootstrap' import results from '../results' const EditForm = (props) => { const uid = props.uid const type = props.type const [something, setSomething] = useState('') var d = new Date() var date = d.getFullYear() + '-' + (d.getMonth() + 1) + '-' + d.getDate() console.log(date) results.get('/user/' + type + '/uid.json') .catch(function (error) { setLoading(false) setError('Database Error') }) const isAgency = props.type === 'serviceagency' ? true : false return (
{isAgency &&
setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} /> setSomething(e.target.value)} />
something: {something}
}
) } export default EditForm
